name: Federico Zivolo
title: Front-End Developer at Sysdig
bio:
\ Hi! I'm Fez, a **Front-End Developer** and **UI Designer** fell in love with web technologies.

\ I love to write **JavaScript**, expecially when I can use it to create awesome websites thanks to my extensive **CSS** knowledge.

\ I'm always excited to discover **new technologies** (or meet the people behind them!), drop a message using the form on the bottom if you'd like to chat.
